Yggdrasil turned around and faced Kup.

Yggdrasil: There is a war greater than this one. I was ordered to
bring Talos back with me, but he has been dead for a long time now.
Seeing Optimus here made me think... I must do what I can to dig those
damned Tripredacus out of our world! If someone has to rise up against
them, then I am ready to follow, and if no one else is up for the
task, then I will go alone. Maybe I will die there, but at least, I'll
do this in his memory!

He pointed at Prime, knowing that he might not be as good a leader as
he had been, but at least, he would try.

Yggdrasil: Don't be mad at me, Kup. I just want you guys to have a
home where to go when you're done slaggin' those predafreaks!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Kup : :
> 
> This shocked Kup back to reality.
> 
> Kup: Leave the planet? Why?
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> By that time, Yggdrasil had lost any sense of prestige that was
> befitting of his rank. He just stood there in utter amazament. In
> front of him was Optimus Prime, the venerable Autobot, the ideal to
> attain, the fabled leader, but most of all, the grandfather he never
> had the chance to meet.
> 
> He raised a hand and passed it on the huge head of his ancestor. He
> felt nostalgic, thinking of Pumpskin, who had fallen in the hands of
> the Preds, the Tripredacus, who had conquered his homeland, and of the
> Survivors, trying to build a semblant of resistance on Earth. His
> fists clenched and emotion swirled in his mind. He hated the Predacons
> for their constant tugs on the Pax Cybertronia, but he was now
> loathing against the Tripredacus. Something had to be done...
> 
> Yggdrasil: I will have to go, Kup. Maybe not now, but my duty tells me
> I'll have to leave this planet.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > : : Kup : :
> > 
> > Kup liked how this Gromlock spoke. Educated, advanced. It was much
> more easy to understand him now.
> > 
> > Kup: I'd like to hear them all...
> > 
> > Kup's attention was stolen from Grimlock when Kup realized just
> where they were in the Ark.
> > 
> > Kup looks up at the center command seat. There, in stasis, was
> Optimus Prime.
> > 
> > 
> > foxmanroar1@a... wrote:
> > In a message dated 6/18/2003 12:56:58 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> roborick007@y... writes:
> > 
> > : : Kup : :
> > Kup follows the others into the Ark. He stays next to Grimlock.
> > 
> > Kup: So old friend, I'm sure we have a lot to catch up on.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > Grimlock Looked over at him, much, you would never beleive the
> paradise we left to ensure your future... My friend this time i have
> many stories i would like to tell you.
